samples.event_description: Join our exclusive sale event this weekend!

fieldPrompt.event_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality square image (1080x1080) that represents your event. Include specific details about the subject matter, setting, lighting, colors, and atmosphere. For sales events, show products; for webinars, show speakers or technology; for in-person events, show the venue or activity. Ensure good contrast and visual appeal.
fieldPrompt.event_name: Write a compelling, attention-grabbing event name (max 10 characters) that creates excitement and clearly communicates the event type. Examples: SALE, SUMMIT 25, WEBINAR, GRAND OPENING, LAUNCH. Use powerful, memorable words.
fieldPrompt.event_description: Craft an engaging event description (max 50 characters) that includes key details like date, time, location (if applicable), and what attendees can expect. Focus on benefits and unique selling points. Make it informative and compelling.
fieldPrompt.company_name: Enter your company or organization name (max 20 characters) as you want it to appear as the event host. Use your official business name or preferred branding for maximum recognition and credibility.
